Description: Tether Holdings operates a platform to store, send, and receive local currency person to person globally.
Full Description: Tether Holdings operates a platform to store, send, and receive local currency person to person globally.  Tether is a token backed by actual fiat currency assets, including USD, Euros and, soon, Japanese Yen. One Tether equals one underlying unit of the currency backing it, e.g., the U.S. Dollar, and is backed 100% by actual assets in the Tether platform’s reserve account. Being anchored or “tethered” to real world currency, Tether provides protection from the volatility of cryptocurrencies. Tether enables businesses – including exchanges, wallets, payment processors, financial services and ATMs – to easily use fiat-backed tokens on blockchains. By leveraging Blockchain technology, Tether allows you to store, send and receive digital tokens person-to-person, globally, instantly, and securely for a fraction of the cost of alternatives.
Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Financial Services, Other, Payments, Software
Founders: Craig Sellars, Giancarlo Devasini, Philip Potter, Reeve Collins

We have built an AI-enabled technology platform, supplemented by analytics and advisory services, to enable companies assess, rate and improve in ESGC areas.  We want to “provide the electricity that lights up an organization’s ESGC bulb” PROBLEM & MARKET OPPORTUNITY ESGC thinking and ESGC metrics are becoming increasingly important to assess company performance, perception and valuation for e.g., sustainable investment market size (investment in companies where ESGC is a focus) is estimated to be $30 Trillion+ globally. Companies at the forefront of ESGC evolution enjoy a 25-50% higher PE compared to its peers. Purely from a Compliance perspective, the cost of non-compliance is nearly 3X the cost of doing it right OUR VALUE PROPOSITION We have created an ecosystem with GovEVA as its hub, to solve for all aspects of ESGC for any organization, more specifically: 1. Assessment, Scoring and Rating, 2. Ongoing Competitive Comparisons/Positioning, 3. Gap Analysis and Roadmap to address Gaps, 4.Detailed Work-planning, Tracking and Reporting and 5.Suite of key Tools, Diagnostics, and Analytics We have built an Intelligent, AI Driven Platform + Analytics and Advisory Services. We rolled out first phase of technology platform focusing on the “GC” of the ESGC, "ES"​ modules underway and planned for 2020 release. Our current platform has 4 key modules: 1. Governance enhancement, 2. Compliance management, 3. Best-in-class e-meeting (with Video Conferencing) platform and 4. Board evaluation platform The above is in market and we are seeing a good response from our target clients.

Description: A new credit & commerce infrastructure to turn supply chains into demand chains and unlock financing for 10 Million+ SMEs.
Full Description: Finplus Group is a technology company building a new credit & commerce infrastructure for emerging markets. We believe that access to markets & financial services should be a human right, available to everyone, everywhere, who wishes to participate in the modern economy. Our goal is to help close the massive $5.2Tn credit deficit faced by SMEs in developing countries every year. Finplus provides white-label digital finance & vertical ecommerce software to: 1. Enable banks & micro-lenders to lend to SMEs, at scale, across multiple markets 2. Help consumer goods companies to digitise sales end-to-end, effectively turning their supply chain into a demand chain 3. Unlock access to an instant line of credit for tens of millions of SMEs and individuals in emerging markets Finplus software has already processed over $1 Billion in transaction value across 5 emerging markets (Kenya, Uganda, Tanzania, Eswatini, South Africa), enabled more than 3 Million MSMEs & individuals to access credit and saved business customers over 1.2 Million man-hours through automation.
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Financial Services, Information Technology, Software

Description: PayLatr.com is a mobile payments platform that enables recurring micro-credits to mid-income households.
Full Description: PayLatr is a recurring micro-credit mobile platform offering interest-free monthly credits to low-income households in India to easily pay for retail transactions without cash, credit cards or other pre-paid means. On average, a middle-income household in India spends about 7,000 – 9,000 rupees at any neighborhood store. More than 95 percent of transactions are in cash because most stores do not accept cards and/or users do not have credit cards. Often, households experience cash crunch issues by using up most of their cash for grocery shopping. PayLatr offers monthly credit to improve their household cash flow by providing recurring monthly credit lines at various merchants, via mobile money.
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Financial Services, Mobile, Payments, Software

Description: Affordable vehicle safety solutions
Full Description: DaddysRoad is a mobile app for affordable vehicle safety,  from Banalore, the silicon valley of India. "Drive with us" being our tag line, it literally means; your vehicle is 'On DaddysRoad', and none dares to mess when you drive on Daddys Road.  We create a platform for people to get in touch with vehicle owners for various reasons we come across in our day-to-day life. Be it a vehicle parked in your parking space or in front of your house, be it a need by public work department to move your vehicle, a threat to vehicle or be it any situation, the current system doesnt gives any option where you can communicate with a vehicle owner. The vehicle license plate number is all what’s required to get in touch.  Smart phones have influenced us so much that, we may forget the wallet while going out but never our mobile phone. Some habits are good and we just made good use of that. Being On Daddys Road allows you to carry an e-copy of all documents related to your vehicle, even the driving license.  Our wheels just started rolling on the road. But soon we are going to spread our wings and gain thrust for the takeoff. We are glad that you are part of this drive along with us On DaddysRoad DaddysRoad is strategically partnered with Taiwan Accelerator in charting its growth map. Taiwan Accelerator (TA) is Asia's first seed accelerator to combine the support of public companies, government, academia and the investment community. Their comprehensive services include seed capital, mentoring, finance, legal, media relations, integrated marketing, branding, investor relations, fund raising, and IPO planning. DaddysRoad at TA start-up is appointed a corporate CFO or IRO as one of the exclusive mentors along with many others to provide guidance on business and finance.
Industry Groups: Information Technology, Internet Services, Transportation
Founders: Jiju Joseph, Jiju Vilavinal George, Vineeth PK
Top 5 Investors: Valiant Ventures, Taiwan Accelerator, Noche Rias Mond

Stormbreaker is industry-agnostic and focused on startups that don’t see capital as an immediate requirement for growth, but instead as the best path forward for their business at the right time. We partner with the high-velocity, high-conviction companies that stand out from their peers because they are driven to build efficiently––companies that prioritize disciplined decision making and market traction over chasing stepped up valuations. Description: Simpool is an AI-based Simulation-as-a-Service ,which enables numerous ‘what-if’ scenarios.
Full Description: Virtual currency-based games are extremely difficult to manage profitably, and inaccurate monitoring can be devastating.  Back in 2017 when we founded Simpool, game developers and publishers wishing to balance their Game Economy needed big media budgets, tons of users and continuous experimentation. They also needed to hire game economists to do the analysis, and even then, there was no really accurate way to know what was really happening.    We believed the market needed a different approach. Building on our AI and machine learning expertise, we developed an “off-the-shelf” solution capable of predicting user behavior, conducting real-world simulations, and providing real-time monitoring of the game economy. Today, as hard core and mid-core games move towards micro transaction strategies, Simpool provides a smart and scalable solution to manage game economy over multiple games. But, Simpool’s vision goes beyond gaming.  In the near-future, we will enable all kinds of companies to leverage AI to discover their next step and up their business performances..
Headquarters Regions: Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA), Middle East
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence, Data and Analytics, Science and Engineering, Software

Description: Refundway is a platform designed to facilitate the refund and return process for customers and sellers alike.
Full Description: Refundway is a platform designed to facilitate the refund and return process for customers and sellers alike. The platform aims to simplify and expedite returns, providing convenience for customers and efficient management for sellers. For customers, Refundway offers a user-friendly interface that guides them through the return process. Whether they are dissatisfied with a product or need to return a damaged item, customers can initiate a return easily. The platform aims to make the return experience as straightforward as possible, minimizing the time and effort required. On the seller's side, Refundway provides a centralized dashboard for managing return requests. Sellers can access real-time updates, enabling them to address customer concerns promptly. This streamlined approach helps sellers efficiently handle returns, reducing administrative burdens and enhancing customer satisfaction. Refundway's focus is on creating a smooth and efficient process for both customers and sellers. By simplifying the refund and return experience, the platform aims to build trust and satisfaction in the e-commerce ecosystem.

Description: TieSet is creating a federated learning platform that achieves data privacy, low latency, and significant cost saving.
Full Description: TieSet Inc. is taking the initiative in collective intelligence era as we believe it is wisdom that drives the future technologies not data itself. We lead the field of intelligence-centric platform with a distributed learning paradigm shift such as federated learning and create an intelligence-centric platform led by world-class research scientists and engineers. Today, cloud-based AI and big data systems face significant challenges but aren’t equipped to meet them head-on. Data privacy has emerged as a global concern, but AI systems utilizing big data simply can’t preserve privacy while learning. Similarly, in a world where IoT and device data outpace the speed of bandwidth growth, latency in AI data processing is causing avoidable bottlenecks.  TieSet has developed STADLE, a Scalable Traceable Adaptive Distributed Learning platform with a core feature of decentralized federated learning that preserves privacy while collecting and maximizing intelligence to be shared. Because intelligence is created and trained locally on edge devices to be gathered by STADLE, our platform generates high-quality intelligence without uploading data, enabling AI systems to operate and perform at scale while offline. Our message is simple. Collect, maximize and share the intelligence around the world. That is the world TieSet envisions for the next generation of technologies, for which we call the Internet of Intelligence (IoI) where intelligence is the one that is mainly exchanged over the Internet, not just raw private data. That said, AI is now transitioning from the product of big data to collective and continuous Intelligence, and can finally be productized in a variety of areas of our lives including finance, robotics, healthcare, automotive, education, public infrastructure, transportation, smart cities and energies, among a lot more others.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence, Commerce and Shopping, Data and Analytics, Health Care, Science and Engineering, Software

Secure online payment options provide added convenience, while the ability to provide feedback after availing the service ensures a continuous feedback loop to enhance customer satisfaction. Full Description: Climasens enables organisations to benchmark their climate resilience by monitoring past, present and future climate risk, impact and performance within our cities We give organisations access to location-based climate intelligence through a web-based SaaS platform, allowing users to understand past climate impacts, current and future climate risks and the ongoing climate performance of locations anywhere in the world using global weather data, modelled climate data, remote and IoT based sensing. We aim to help organisations analyze and visualize how climate change impacts assets, people, and places to better support and enhance climate resilient decision making for cities and organisation dedicated to improving our built and natural environment

Industries: Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain, Information Technology, Machine Learning
Description: AIgatha —  a popularized artificial intelligence platform
Full Description: There are phrases of how we integrate our core technologies:  LUCA - Blockchain Features of LUCA Architecture 1. Separating token transactions and computing by connecting the public chain and the private chain; 2. More added values by allowing miners to maintain ledger and realize project computing. As ETH is a sophisticated blockchain supported by numerous miners, we choose ETH smart contract as transaction medium for AIgatha token.  It can also avoid transaction congestion due to shortage of miners at the early phase of AIgatha. Pangu - Distributed computing system In this phase, we will implement DC system on the blockchain.  Features of Pangu Architecture: 1. The cost of the computing power engaged in the jobs depends the amount of payment. Every task released in the Primordial Soup will be involved with more than two miners. 2. More than 2 miners will be assigned to one task so as to increase the return rate; their results will be verified with each other in order to ensure the accuracy of the results simply. 3. Blockchain make the status of these tasks become open and transparent. Information includes the miners responsible for computing, the computing duration and so on. By doing so, some existing problems in the DC products such as black-box operation will be addressed. 4. Task assignment mechanism is designed to make cloud computing safer by eliminating the possibility that miners cannot assemble the whole picture of one job in spite that they are computing many tasks in one job. 5. Mist computing will reduce the dependence in the cloud computing. 6. Whitelist mechanism only allows users with ID verfication to use the system so as to aviod malicious use. 7. Simple and intuitive-to-use interface and DC API allow users to quickly master the system to solve all kinds of problems. This phase is named Pangu when we will build DC system based on LUCA. IChing -  AI services platform  At this phase, we will develop different types of AI services platform based on blockchain. Features of AI Services Platform: 1. Common/Easy File Format: Users only need to save the data file as CSV. file which can be read by the AI services platform for forecasting services. 2. Intuitive-designed Graphic Operation Interface: Programming beginners can easily use AIgatha AI services platform, skipping complicated developing process and background preparation. 3. Multiple AI Agorithms: AIgatha AI servcies platfrom can operate popular AI agorithms and will conclude with the ultimate result based on the statistics of prediction results and the development of AIgatha's technologies. 4. Forecasting Models: users can download the forecasting model built by AIgatha's AI services platform in case that it can be used for the similar topic in the future. 5. Quality Data and Powerful Analysis: data mining and machine learning will help users to develop the best applications and produce the product by searching for the answers as soon as possible. 6. Privacy and Safety: Since AIgatha's AI services platform will work out the forecasting based on statistics, users are not required to provide any name or description of eigenvalues in the dataset. The Chronos Fortress provides edge cache service that means highly privacy, consistency and extenability. 7. Selection of Important Eigenvalues: AIgatha's AI services platform will select eigenvalues for users to know which eigenvalues in the dataset are the key to the prediction, making sure users get the answers together with reasons behind. 8. Detailed and Complete Forecasting Analysis Report: Users are available to purchase the whole forecasting analysis report of the datasets that includes information processed by AI technologies such as relevant background values. Xirang - Complete Blockchain System In this phase, we plan to build/implement forecasting platforms based on the existing architecture. Moreover, improved developing interface will encourage more developers to use our project developing platform. Our ultimate goal in this phase is to deploy the Chronos Fortress around the world. The ultimate goal of AIgatha is to build a complete blockchain system, specifically including: 1. All suspending problems can resort to this blockchain for solutions. 2. The feature of blockchain will help to store a large amount of data and ensure the reliability of the source. 3. Key informations will be screened out among explosive data via the platform. 4. Information will be gathered and technologies will be developed  in an accelerating speed. 5. An open platform will be built. 6. Users-friendly and graphic developing interface will be designed. 7. Developers: they will make use of the existing computing power of the blockchain and focus on developing algorithms. 8. Users: they will be able to purchase the solutions with AIgatha token. 9. Individuals, small- and medium-size labs and corporates will be relieved with our platform.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Other, Science and Engineering, Software

Industries: Credit Bureau, Financial Services, FinTech, SaaS
Description: We're passionate about financial inclusion. We make a borderless credit scoring, fair risk profiles, and a portable financial history
Full Description: At goscore, we're passionate about financial inclusion. We achieve this through cross-border credit scoring, fair risk profiles, and a portable financial history that moves from country to country with you.  Historically, people have been excluded from financial services because of, let's say, poverty. While you don’t have a proper risk profile, you fall prey to payday lenders. Now you are trapped. Others have chosen to exclude themselves from traditional financial services. What that means? They make lifestyle decisions to become nomadic in the way they live, work, and earn money. The challenge that entrepreneurs and nomads have is that they can't get an affordable rental apartment, or a mobile phone, or a credit card in their new home. Why? For people with both these profiles, either their credit history is not portable or a standard risk profile simply doesn't suit them. So at goscore we built a cross-border credit scoring solution that is fair and human-centric. We bring your financial history with you wherever you go.  Goscore also enables lenders to accurately assess your creditworthiness based on up-to-date information from various data sources. goscore brings your credit history to you, without borders. So, whoever was previously excluded, is now included. Using machine learning, our solution leverages up-to-date transactional data and derives relevant financial insights to build real-time comprehensive financial profiles. In turn, these profiles enable our customers to make sustainable lending decisions. Our technology recently helped a lender to increase creditworthy borrowers by 21% and reduce default rates by 32%. We are an authorized credit scoring company in Norway.
Headquarters Regions: Nordic Countries, Scandinavia, Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Financial Services, Software
Founders: Alex Shub, Anastasiya Lebedz, Kris Kalbasiuk, Maksim Hardziyenak

Description: Ibex Biosciences engages in a diverse approach to research and development.
Full Description: Ibex Biosciences engages in a diverse approach to research and development. Ibex strives to discover, validate, and produce potential solutions to a multitude of serious challenges facing human and ecological health by investing in exploratory projects and processes that may not have been validated within the public research community. The company develops therapeutic antibodies, gene therapy, and stem cell programs intended to address unmet medical conditions plaguing humanity. Its robust portfolio focuses on three primary areas: (1) cancer and non-cancer therapeutic antibodies/intrabody: Ibex is producing and developing antibodies targeting multiple cancers including breast, prostate, glioblastoma, lung, and neuroblastoma; (2) Cancer Gene Therapy: Ibex is developing a gene therapy that targets multiple cancer cells in-vitro including glioblastoma, melanoma, and cervical; and (3) Diagnostic Antibodies: Ibex is developing a skin cancer initial diagnostic, a CIN (Cervical Intraepithelial Neoplasia) diagnostic, and an early-stage pancreatic cancer diagnostic. It was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Cumberland, Maryland.
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Science and Engineering

Description: actyv.ai is a cutting-edge B2B SaaS platform with hassle-free partner onboarding, flexible BNPL options, embedded insurance and more.
Full Description: Imagine a future where B2B supply chains are revolutionised through embedded finance and insurance.  Say hello to actyv.ai, a cutting-edge B2B SaaS platform with hassle-free partner onboarding, flexible Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL) options and embedded insurance. Powered by artificial intelligence, the company has introduced a game-changing solution to transform the B2B supply chain by democratising financial inclusivity and providing innovative insurance and investment products.  The actyv.ai Offering:   •	actyvGo - Unlock top-line growth through hassle-free digitized partner onboarding and offboarding.  •	actyvScore - AI-driven multidimensional score to find the right business partner.  •	actyvPayLater - Access to purpose-based BNPL payment options for distributors and retailers.   •	actyvInsure - Bite-sized insurance options for distributors and retailers.  •	ActvvInvest - Curated investment products, like digital gold and mutual funds, for business partners to invest surplus working capital.  With these offerings, actyv.ai acts as a one-stop-solution for a diverse range of industries, including FMCG, pharma, energy and utilities, agriculture, infrastructure, and auto. With unique, cross-industry applicability, actyv.ai is vertical-agnostic platform, aimed at fostering seamless B2B interactions. Complete with partner onboarding, embedded finance, BuyNowPayLater options, insurance, and investment products, actyv.ai intends to stay at the forefront of digitalisation for businesses in India and across the globe.  Co-founded by Raghunath Subramanian and Ramkumar Thirumurthi, actyv.ai offers businesses of all sizes the ability to seamlessly interact with supply chain partners and financial institutions on a single platform. This means increased efficiency, profitability, and a smooth supply chain experience from start to finish.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence, Data and Analytics, Financial Services, Information Technology, Other, Science and Engineering, Software
Founders: Ambarish Ojha, Raghu Venkat, Raghunath Subramanian, Ramkumar Thirumurthi

Description: STL has developed the next generation platform for fully automated and surface shape conforming Spatially Augmented Reality
Full Description: STL has created the next generation platform for fully automated Spatially Augmented Reality for immersive data analytics, situational awareness for commercial, industrial, defense and emergency management, command and control, data analytics, training & simulation and low cost fixed/portable simulators.  Our system automatically captures the surface shape regardless of complexity, 2D, 3D or surround and the completes the full projection mapping pipeline in 3-4minutes.  Works with most existing systems or we can design a bespoke setup to fit your needs.  Minimize your touch time and life cycle costs while increasing system up time. We are also developing the technology for Projected Augmented Reality for AI enabled Remote Surgical Guidance to achieve higher quality outcomes and expand global capacity for craniofacial surgery. Description: Climber is a Revenue Management Software for small hotel chains.
Full Description: Climber is a Revenue Management Software (RMS) for small hotel chains. We provide intelligent pricing for the hospitality industry, helping hotels maximize revenue with an automatic and self-learning software that detects opportunities and takes immediate actions.  Climber taps into a hotel’s existing reservation system and puts its machine learning to work by not only considering the historical data of the hotel but also the market demand (air traffic, local events, weather forecast, online reputation). We have an exceptional team of 14 strong individuals (9 nationalities) with complimentary skills from Data Science, Engineers, Sales to Marketing.  Everyone is operating in-person from our offices in Lisbon. A complimentary mix of hustling, Revenue Management expertise and Data Science/Mathematicians. There is a growing demand for accommodation globally and that's particularly obvious in most city hotels who are often fully booked. Managing the existing inventory and maximizing the profit is a key challenge of small hotel chains today since technology has had limited impact. From the software stack perspective a hotel typically should use three types of software (PMS + Channel Manager + RMS) and we understood that for hotels that have the need to optimize their revenue it's impossible without data driven software. We understood as well that there is a big gap in the hotel space since small hotel chains don't have access to accessible Revenue Management Systems. Due to the lack of financial capacity and know-how on how to use the current complex and expensive Revenue management systems on the market, small hotel chains end up doing daily analysis on spreadsheets that are both time-consuming and information-poor resulting in making decisions that leave hotels running below their full revenue potential.  Climber tackle the needs of small hotel chains by providing an accessible solution that is easy to use, fast to integrate and automated, replacing the manual labor on daily analysis and reporting that before was costing the hotels a massive amount of time.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence, Data and Analytics, Science and Engineering, Software, Travel and Tourism

Description: OccasionGenius is an event discovery technology company provides services to large companies to capture the experiential consumer.
Full Description: OccasionGenius is the most comprehensive and personalized event technology company for enterprise clients.  Using AI, OccasionGenius identifies events, classifies events based on its patented technology, and makes recommendations for each user's "interest genome". Part of the genius is that it gets smarter with every click, getting to know each user's event interests. Several verticals use OccasionGenius' technology on an enterprise level. Examples include: 1) Hotels - OccasionGenius offers a "proactive concierge" service with an event digest outlining events happening during a guest's stay, with 2 days before and after and a button allowing guests to "extend my stay." The valuable customer service add-on allows hotels to wow guests, compete with AirBnB, brand themselves as local and experiential, and increase overall customer satisfaction reviews.  2) Universities - OccasionGenius offers universities a way to integrate new students into the community at large with a Friday community events email populated by OccasionGenius. Events are customized for the student body - for instance, a business school can focus on business-related events in the area.  3) Relocation - OccasionGenius provides relocation companies with a valuable service helping employees who are new to the area get acclimated and connected to their new community, through a weekly email that shows the events picked for them in their new neighborhood.  4) Real Estate Agent CRMs - OccasionGenius provides agents a co-branded weekly email to provide value to their clients after the sale as a closing gift, which allows the agents to stay top of mind and to brand themselves as a local expert.
Industry Groups: Advertising, Data and Analytics, Events, Media and Entertainment, Sales and Marketing

Description: Mitochon Pharmaceuticals is a start-up biotech company.
Full Description: Mitochon Pharmaceuticals is a start-up biotech company, formed in 2014, that focuses on developing drugs that target the mitochondria for a host of serious diseases with significant unmet medical needs. Their development programs are primarily focused on neurodegenerative & neuromuscular diseases including: Huntington’s, Batten Disease, Stroke, Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy (DMD), Alzheimer’s Disease, Parkinson Disease and severe burns, and secondarily on metabolic disorders due to over-nutrition (diabetes, obesity and NASH). On-going research has linked these diseases to various malfunctions of the mitochondria. By correcting them, Mitochon aims at opening the way for a broad range of disease modifying therapies. Mitochon is led by a team of industry executives with over 80-years of combined experience and a passion to bring forward breakthrough drug therapies for a host of devastating diseases.

Description: All-in-One HMO management, connecting compatible tenants and minimising vacancy rates.
Full Description: "COHO provides effortless HMO management, connecting compatible tenants and minimising vacancy rates". That's it in a nutshell, but there's a load within those words. "Effortless HMO management": COHO is built from the ground up specifically for HMO management. Effortlessly. We break all tasks and compliancy into 20+ services, all of which you can use for free. Kind of like having an amazing personal assistant. "Connecting compatible tenants": Where you live is more than just a bedroom and kitchen. COHO helps tenants find not only the right home but the right people. We will remove the anxiety young professionals have about living in shared houses. "So you're taking on SpareRoom?" ... Kind of. It's high time there's worthy competition. "Minimising vacancy rates": When tenants are compatible they stay for longer. When you have a seamless, automated move-out/move-in process, the room is empty for less time. We believe the future of living is high quality co-homes, with people you enjoy spending an evening with. We hope to never hear a landlord say that investing in an HMO is too much effort. Note: HMO is a UK term for multi-let housing, a property shared by people from families.

Description: Gladius is a cybersecurity company that decentralized CDN and DDoS protection on the Ethereum Blockchain.
Full Description: Gladius is a cybersecurity company that decentralized CDN and DDoS protection on the Ethereum Blockchain. The company also enables anyone to rent out their unused bandwidth to be a part of a DDoS protection network. Through their decentralized network on the blockchain, anyone around the globe can rent out their spare computation power and bandwidth to be part of content delivery and DDoS protection network. The Gladius DDoS software platform aggregates massive amounts of unused bandwidth from corporations and individuals, making that bandwidth instantly available to any participating company to easily, inexpensively, and effectively defend against inbound DDoS attacks. They are building innovative protection solutions that can adapt to the ever-changing threat landscape of the internet. The company ecosystem will drastically reduce the overall costs of CDN and DDoS mitigation services, enhance the security and openness of the market, create an internal market of perfect competition, markedly improve the user experience, and disrupt the CDN and DDoS protection market.

In January 2019, SVB Financial Group (“SVB”), the holding company of Silicon Valley Bank, a U.S.-based high-tech commercial bank, acquired the Leerink businesses including Leerink Capital.  Todd Cozzens, Jared Kesselheim, MD, and SVB expect to agree to a mutually beneficial ongoing relationship in which Transformation Capital (as an independent management company owned by Todd Cozzens, Jared Kesselheim, MD, and Michael Dixon and not affiliated with SVB or Leerink Capital) shall manage Fund II and whereby Transformation Capital shall manage Fund I’s investment portfolio pursuant to a sub-advisory agreement with SVB (or an affiliate). Full Description: Sensee is an IoTaaS platform for SMEs, aiming to unlock the promise of IoT driven automation and data driven business intelligence currently only available to large enterprises through a range of full stack, plug and play, inexpensive IoT solutions combined with a marketplace for apps and analytics integrations. Sensors record temperature data, gateway aggregates data from all sources and sends to cloud where it is accessible in a user reporting dashboard. System sends alerts when problems occur, ensures regulatory compliance, prevents inventory loss, protects customer health and saves time, money and worry.  Proprietary technology to be modified for new sensor types (i.e. location, optical, electrical), new “things” to monitor (i.e. customer traffic, inventory, product use, fleets) and new uses (i.e. asset monitoring, personalized marketing, telematics, surveillance) as we expand the platform.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US

Description: Filio solves a problem that many can relate to: you take a bunch of photos, and then never get around to organizing them.
Full Description: Filio solves a problem that many can relate to: you take a bunch of photos, and then never get around to organizing them. The photos just sit in your phone’s gallery, or maybe in a folder on your computer, but all the details are often lost to history. It is no different for construction and other projects. Employees frequently document projects via photos but miss important details or, when they download the photos days later, forget the exact context or location of many of the images. Filio provides a solution via a cloud-based, integrated mobile and web-based software application that facilitates collection and management of visual information (photos and videos). Filio enables enhanced information collection by augmenting the captured images and videos with geospatial data as well as custom user-defined metadata (such as captions and tags), and uses state-of-the-art artificial intelligence and computer vision for smart labeling and cataloging.

These women understand and appreciate the benefits of nursing as the healthiest, natural form of infant nutrition.   This will be the first product to allow mothers, pediatricians, and lactation consultants the ability to evaluate human milk for allergens in real time.  These users will be supported with the Free to Feed app.  Mothers will annotate which allergens are present in addition to the date and time of milk expression and nursing/feed.  Parents can also record any symptoms which will allow correlative and comprehensive data to assist medical professionals in determining the culprit.  This data will be compiled in a summary page which can be shared with medical professionals. The number of reported food intolerance symptoms has spiked, and our understanding of early immune development is subsequently evolving.  Converse to previous recommendations to avoid early top food allergen introduction, recent studies have shown early and sustained introduction to the infant diet may influence the risk of allergic or autoimmune disease for those patients who do not already exhibit allergic symptoms before one year of age.  A meta-analysis of 146 studies concluded that early introduction was associated with a moderately lower risk of developing egg or peanut allergy.  This has shifted the AAP peanut and egg recommendations without providing mothers with the tools to effectively introduce.
Headquarters Regions: Research Triangle, East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Health Care

Our software converts electric vehicles into energy storage units, allowing owners to play an active role in reducing their carbon footprint and earn rewards in the process. By controlling the charging of EVs connected to private chargers throughout the city, we're able to provide grid flexibility, reduce electricity costs for owners, and even generate passive income for EV owners through profit sharing. We believe that climate leadership is not just about individual impact, but the collective efforts of like-minded individuals to effect real, actionable change. Our synchronized EV charging reduces the need for compensating fossil fuels, while allowing for the introduction of even more renewable power. At Tether, we stand behind our belief that great things can be achieved when we come together.

Description: Qdesq is India's largest tech-enabled brokerage free platform for today’s workforce to search, sort and book a flexible workspace.
Full Description: Qdesq.com is a premier destination and nation’s largest tech-enabled platform for today’s workforce to search, sort and book a flexible and serviced workspace, without the hassle of a lease or brokerage and moreover completely Free of Charge (without any brokerage).  Simultaneously, Qdesq.com is an opportunity to the workspace providers (corporate offices, landlords and occupiers, business centers, hotels and coworking spaces) to monetize their unused and vacant workspace inventory of work desks, meeting rooms, cabins, and private suites.  We started our journey in Nov 2015 with an intention to create a new model for workspaces, in fact disrupt the traditional office leasing demand and supply equation. The mission is to convert square feet based industry into per seat based. Thus, started a tech platform to discover, evaluate and book flexible workspaces. The platform induces "on -demand", transparency and agility to the whole process.  Qdesq is now the largest and fastest growing flexible workspace rental platform providing office seekers with ready to move in serviced offices, as per their budget, location and terms. These workspaces are branded coworking and serviced offices, unbranded shared offices and built to suit - bespoke private managed offices (with services and investments from an established operators).  In terms of scale, we have 1645 venues with 5400 listings on our platform and we do 220+ transaction per month. We have been growing 4x YOY with gross transaction volumes poised at USD 6.2 MN for this year. Client Segments and Space Matrix: 1. Startups, freelancers and extremely budgeted requirements - Unbranded shared offices and neighbourhood coworking spaces. 2. Corporate Clients (established startups and Indian companies with flexible requirements) - Branded chains like Innov8, 91 Sprinboard, Awfis, Redbricks, indiqube, etc 3. Enterprise Segment ( with flexible requirements) - High end serviced offices like Regus Spaces, Wework, cowrks, skootr etc. 4. Enterprise with large built to suit requirements and want private managed office - Space providers from 3rd and 4th segments are pitched in, depending on location, client type and pricing.
Industry Groups: Internet Services, Real Estate

Description: DatChat, Inc. is a personal privacy platform, focused on Encrypted Communication, Internet Security and Digital Rights Management.
Full Description: Currently no messaging platform allows you to change the rights to your messages after you hit send.  DatChat Messenger with total privacy control for both individual and group messages is the first   messenger that always gives you the option to erase or change how long your messages last on the other person’s phone.   It doesn’t matter if you set your messages to last forever or automatically self-destruct, because at any time each sender can wipe them off the recipient’s phone or give them more time.   Senders can choose to change the rights to a single message or destruct all of their messages at the same time.   Biggest threat to our Privacy:  While the media focuses on the potential for the government to invade our privacy, the real threat comes from what happen to our messages in our recipient’s hands and the potential embarrassment they might cause.  Personal and business relationships are constantly evolving and DatChat provides a way to manage the digital rights to our messages.  DatChat eliminates sender regret.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US

Description: SAR is a software, technology, and data analytics company.
Full Description: SAR is a software, technology, and data analytics company. The SAR platforms enable securities class action attorneys, D&O insurance carriers, alternative dispute resolution professionals, and investment professionals to make informed decisions related to potential exposure and liability stemming from corrective events. Subscribers across both platforms have access to sound and independent securities class action measures and metrics up to the point of requiring specialized expert consultation.  ​ SAR offers two distinct service platforms to subscribers. The Securities Class Action Data Analytics (SCADA) platform presents subscribers with objective data and verifiable analysis based on methodologies established by case precedents in the U.S. Federal Court system. The platform is tailor-made to serve key stakeholders in securities class action litigation with statistical and quantitative analysis on filed and proprietary cases for alleged violations of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934. The Insurance Carrier Class Action Data Analytics (ICCADA) platform presents subscribers with objective and real-time measures of risk and exposure for potential event-driven claims from alleged violations of the federal securities laws under Section 10(b) and 20(a) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934.

Description: Bezalel Inc. is an American wireless charging technology company headquartered in Playa Vista, Los Angeles.
Full Description: BEZALEL was founded in 2014 to find a solution for what is arguably the foremost problem with today’s mobile, highly-connected lifestyle. It’s a problem just about everyone has experienced -- the batteries that power our smartphones, tablets and wearable gadgets run out of power too quickly. While the problem is simple, the solution has thus far proven to be more complex. As a result, nearly all of our “wireless” devices are still charged by plugging a cord into a power source.  At BEZALEL we’re focused on empowering every mobile device user to ditch the power cord, both at home and on-the-go. We design and manufacture advanced wireless charging technology destined to transform how we use today’s power-hungry mobile devices.  BEZALEL isn’t just a hardware or technology company; we’re a team of problem solvers devoted to bringing omnipresent wireless charging to everyone. When a smartphone, tablet or other mobile device loses its charge, its user loses his or her ability to stay connected to the world. That’s why our team at BEZALEL is so passionate – we’re focused on solving a real problem and helping people make the most of technology that has become essential to modern life. At BEZALEL, we exist to be different.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Los Angeles Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Consumer Electronics, Hardware, Mobile

Description: Construction collaboration platform for real estate developers and general contractors
Full Description: Builderhead is a construction management software designed for real estate developers and general contractors. The software combines project development, procurement, and construction management into a streamlined pipeline. We bring an industry spesific Project Development CRM, Bid Management Tools and Project Management Software in one easy-to-use platform which integrates easily with other most used software in the industry.  Even thought the construction industry accounts for 13% of the world’s GDP, there's been a global problem of poor productivity within the industry as productivity growth has increased only 1% over the past 20 years. From the real estate developers and general contractors point of view, the biggest issue is the projects that turn unprofitable unexpectedly. One unprofitable project destroys the whole year profits and another one can bankrupt the entire company. Most of the decisions that affect the success of a project are made before construction begins, but still there are no smart tools available for that stage to help the construction companies avoid unprofitable projects. We solve this global problem by bringing the most critical steps to the success of a construction project on the same platform.

Description: Alacura is a medical transportation benefits management company dedicated to offering patients the medical transport services.
Full Description: Alacura is a medical transportation benefits management company dedicated to offering patients the medical transport services. They work with health plans to manage their non-emergent air and ground transportation needs for their members.  They are developing high quality, a cost-effective national network of air and ground transportation service providers to provide beside-to-bedside service.  They have clinical protocols to help ensure the safe, efficient transportation of patients across a variety of transportation modes.   They offer a one phone call solution to verify insurance coverage, preauthorize the flight, and coordinate the logistics bedside-to-bedside. They coordinate flights with their health plan partners to assure prompt payment for services and to maximize the flight opportunities for their network partners. It provides a total benefit management solution where utilization review, network organization, and claims administration meld.

Industries: Consumer Goods, E-Commerce, Mobile, Peer to Peer
Description: GrabOnRent is driven by a very simple principle of providing accessibility to products to everyone
Full Description: Things are kept simple at GrabonRent. All you have to do is browse through the extensive range of products; there are also options to compare the prices, delivery times etc. for multiple items. Once you select the item and make the payment and security deposit online, the item gets delivered to your doorstep. Each item passes through a stringent quality check before dispatch to ensure the best of services. After use, the item gets picked up, again from your doorstep. Security deposit is then returned online after verification and quality check of the item. GrabonRent attempts to promote optimal utilization of the products by offering flexible rental times. This means that you can rent the item either on an hourly, daily or monthly basis. What this means is that you don’t have to rent the item for a whole day if you plan to use it only for a few hours. On the customer end, this will save money and reduce the risk of damage or loss associated with renting for periods longer than intended use. For the business this will mean saving the inventory and carrying costs as the same item can be quickly shipped to another customer, after the mandatory quality checks.
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Consumer Goods, Mobile, Other
Founders: Aditya Sharma, Manish S Sugandhi, Shubham Jain
